description: WeWash Laundromat is located at 87 North Street in Middletown, NY. Our clean, modern facility features large-capacity washers, efficient dryers, and comfortable folding areas.
We serve over 1,000 customers weekly with self-service laundry, professional wash & fold, and expert alterations.
clinic.environment: WeWash provides a clean, bright, and welcoming environment. Our facility features comfortable folding stations, TV entertainment, free WiFi, and a Kids Creative Zone. We pride ourselves on maintaining spotless machines and a friendly atmosphere.

journey.story:
For the past 5 years, we've been proud to serve the Middletown community with reliable and high-quality laundry care. What began as North Street Laundromat has evolved into WeWash - a fresh brand identity that reflects our commitment to innovation and excellence.

Our journey started with a simple goal: provide a clean, welcoming space where people can do their laundry without stress. Over the years, we've added professional wash & fold service, on-site alterations, and community programs like our Kids Zone and Wash & Fold Club.

We've partnered with local businesses like Gallery Chang to create the Kids Creative Zone, making laundry day easier for parents. We've hosted charity flea markets, holiday raffles, and community events - giving back to the neighborhood that supports us.

Today, WeWash is more than a laundromat. It's a community hub where neighbors meet, families get things done, and everyone is treated with respect and care. Our machines are modern, our team is friendly, and our commitment to quality never wavers.

Thank you for being part of our journey. We can't wait for the next chapter with you.
journey.title: Our Story

profile.bio: WeWash (formerly North Street Laundromat) has been serving the Middletown community with reliable laundry services for over 5 years. Our team is dedicated to providing a first-class laundry experience with premium care, cutting-edge machines, and personalized customer service.
profile.name: WeWash Team
profile.quote: Your clothes deserve the best care, and we deliver with expert attention and community values.
profile.title: Professional Laundry Care Since 2019

philosophy.title: Our Approach

principles.title: First-Class Experience
principles.description: Your clothes deserve the best. We deliver with premium care, expert attention, and cutting-edge machines that go beyond standard washes.

principles.title: Next-Level Clean
principles.description: Our advanced machines offer deep-clean cycles for freshness like never before. We deep clean our dryers every week to ensure your clothes are perfectly clean every time.

principles.title: Personalized Service
principles.description: Whether you need assistance or expert laundry advice, our team is here for you. We treat every customer like family.

principles.title: Community Connection
principles.description: WeWash isn't just a laundromat - it's part of your neighborhood. We collaborate with local businesses like Gallery Chang and support the community through outreach programs and charitable events.

principles.title: Convenience & Rewards
principles.description: Join our Wash & Fold Club for Speed Drop Off service (stay in your car, we pick up your laundry). Collect stamps, spin the wheel, win prizes.

principles.title: Family-Friendly
principles.description: Kids Zone Membership offers a creative play area so parents can do laundry stress-free. Collect stamps for fun rewards.

philosophy.introduction: At WeWash, we believe laundry care should be convenient, affordable, and stress-free. Here's what sets us apart:

items.institution: Excellent Google reviews from real customers

areas.title: Alterations

specializations.title: Our Services
specializations.description: WeWash provides comprehensive laundry solutions for individuals, families, and businesses:

items: Weekly deep cleaning of all dryers
Regular software upgrades for card payment systems
Monthly equipment inspections and preventive maintenance
Staff training on fabric care and customer service
Continuous facility improvements (lighting, folding stations, seating)
Community feedback integration for service improvements
